name: Clocksmith Exorcist
description:
Fight your way through a haunted estate on your quest to exercise the demon that's taken over Old Man Hickertock.

CONTROLS:

-WASD/Arrow keys to move

-The sword tries to point towards the mouse. Get the sword moving fast enough and it will turn blue and you'll be able to damage enemies.
